oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Down to the Promised Land: 5 Years of Bloodshot Records
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bloodshot Records (Firm); Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black and red on brown) announcing Down to the Promised Land: Five Years of Bloodshot Records, a double CD featuring artists such as Alejandro Escovedo, Old 97's, and Neko Case. Poster features a metal photoplate of the album cover, which depicts a skeleton cowboy on a horse surrounded by a flower border.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dan Jimmerfield
